plan_overview: This learning plan is designed to introduce you to the fundamentals of ISO 27001, focusing on understanding the standard's requirements, implementation challenges, and assessment methods. The plan begins with foundational concepts of information security management systems (ISMS) and ISO 27001 compliance, then explores practical assessment frameworks and user acceptance factors. It also covers governance integration with COBIT and extends to related standards and emerging regulatory contexts. The strategy emphasizes actionable knowledge and practical assessment tools to build a solid base for ISO 27001 basics.

reading_order.why_first: Introduces a practical framework and software tool (I-SolFramework) for assessing ISO 27001 compliance readiness, providing a hands-on approach to understanding ISO 27001 controls and assessment.
key_questions: What are the key components of ISO 27001 compliance readiness?
How does I-SolFramework assist in assessing ISMS?
What practical challenges arise in ISO 27001 assessment?
reading_order.paper_title:
Integrated Solution Modeling Software: A New Paradigm on Information
  Security Review and Assessment

reading_order.why_first: Builds on the previous paper by detailing a novel method for measuring ISMS compliance readiness, deepening understanding of assessment metrics and frameworks.
key_questions: How is compliance readiness quantitatively measured?
What are the compliance parameters used?
How can this method improve ISO 27001 implementation?
reading_order.paper_title:
A Novel Method on ISO 27001 Reviews: ISMS Compliance Readiness Level
  Measurement

reading_order.why_first: Explores user acceptance factors critical to successful ISO 27001 implementation in organizations, highlighting human and organizational aspects.
key_questions: What influences user acceptance of ISO 27001?
How do social norms and perceived usefulness affect implementation?
What strategies improve acceptance in public organizations?
reading_order.paper_title:
Analysis of the User Acceptance for Implementing ISO/IEC 27001:2005 in
  Turkish Public Organizations

reading_order.why_first: Discusses governance integration of ISO 27001 with COBIT, providing insight into managing information security holistically within enterprises.
key_questions: What are the benefits of integrating COBIT with ISO 27001?
How does combined governance improve ISMS effectiveness?
What are the challenges of dual implementation?
reading_order.paper_title: Governing Information Security in Conjunction with COBIT and ISO 27001

reading_order.why_first: Presents a case study assessing ISMS compliance gaps, offering practical insights into real-world ISO 27001 implementation and evaluation.
key_questions: How to identify gaps between ISO 27001 requirements and implementation?
What factors influence compliance levels?
How can organizations improve ISMS maturity?
reading_order.paper_title:
Has your organization compliance with ISMS? A case study in an Iranian
  Bank

reading_order.why_first: Introduces a maturity strategy for information security, helping you understand how to measure and improve ISMS maturity over time.
key_questions: What maturity models apply to information security?
How to prioritize security improvements?
How does maturity measurement support ISO 27001 goals?
reading_order.paper_title: An Adaptable Maturity Strategy for Information Security

reading_order.why_first: Explores the interplay between ISMS and AI management systems in the context of new regulations, broadening understanding of ISO 27001's evolving role.
key_questions: How does ISO 27001 integrate with AI risk management?
What extensions are needed for AI compliance?
How do regulatory requirements impact ISMS?
reading_order.paper_title: Interplay of ISMS and AIMS in context of the EU AI Act

reading_order.why_first: Provides background on ISO standards development processes, helping you appreciate the structure and rationale behind ISO 27001 and related standards.
key_questions: What is the ISO standards development process?
How are standards like ISO 27001 structured?
What role do data models and metadata play in standards?

reading_order.why_first: Introduces safety-security assurance frameworks relevant to standards compliance, useful for understanding assurance in ISMS contexts.
key_questions: What is the Safety-Security Assurance Framework (SSAF)?
How can Bayesian networks support compliance assurance?
What lessons apply to ISO 27001 assurance?
reading_order.paper_title:
Independent Co-Assurance using the Safety-Security Assurance Framework
  (SSAF): A Bayesian Belief Network Implementation for IEC 61508 and Common
  Criteria

reading_order.why_first: Presents a risk assessment framework integrating IT security and safety, relevant for understanding risk management in ISO 27001.
key_questions: How to separate IT security and safety requirements?
What risk assessment methods support ISMS?
How does ISA99/IEC62443 relate to ISO 27001?
reading_order.paper_title: Towards an IT Security Risk Assessment Framework for Railway Automation

reading_order.why_first: Although focused on ISO 26262, this paper offers insights into architecting under uncertainty and compliance processes that can inform ISO 27001 implementation strategies.
key_questions: What processes support compliance under uncertainty?
How to design architectural assumptions for compliance?
What lessons from ISO 26262 apply to ISO 27001?
reading_order.paper_title: ATRIUM -- Architecting Under Uncertainty for ISO 26262 compliance

reading_order.why_first: Focuses on systematic design methods for functional safety, complementing understanding of structured compliance approaches relevant to ISO 27001.
key_questions: How to leverage diagnostic specifications for compliance?
What systematic design methods aid standard adherence?
How to reuse legacy components compliantly?
reading_order.paper_title:
A Method towards the Systematic Architecting of Functionally Safe
  Automated Driving -- Leveraging Diagnostic Specifications for FSC design

reading_order.why_first: Discusses architectural challenges in safety-critical systems, providing context for rigorous design and compliance management applicable to ISO 27001.
key_questions: What are challenges in architecting safe systems?
How to maintain safety with legacy platforms?
What architectural rigor supports compliance?
reading_order.paper_title: Architecting Safe Automated Driving with Legacy Platforms

reading_order.why_first: Examines ISO 26262 application in control design, offering insights into safety standards that parallel ISO 27001's risk and control focus.
key_questions: How is ISO 26262 applied in control design?
What parallels exist with ISO 27001 controls?
How to address safety in automated systems?
reading_order.paper_title: On the Application of ISO 26262 in Control Design for Automated Vehicles

reading_order.why_first: Evaluates benefits of ISO 26262 compliant components, illustrating cross-domain assurance benefits relevant to ISMS components.
key_questions: What assurance benefits do compliant components provide?
How can automotive safety standards inform ISMS?
What are challenges in component assurance?
reading_order.paper_title:
Assurance Benefits of ISO 26262 compliant Microcontrollers for
  safety-critical Avionics

reading_order.why_first: Studies security assurance cases in agile development, relevant for understanding assurance documentation and processes in ISO 27001 environments.
key_questions: What are security assurance cases (SACs)?
How do SACs support compliance?
How to adapt SACs in agile workflows?
reading_order.paper_title:
Evaluating the Role of Security Assurance Cases in Agile Medical Device
  Development

reading_order.why_first: Revisits safety definitions for autonomous systems, highlighting evolving safety and security concepts that impact standards like ISO 27001.
key_questions: How do autonomous systems challenge traditional safety?
What new safety concepts emerge?
How do these affect ISMS?

reading_order.why_first: Though focused on electricity markets, this paper introduces chance-constrained stochastic methods that can inspire risk assessment approaches in ISMS.
key_questions: What is chance-constrained stochastic modeling?
How can uncertainty be managed in risk assessments?
What lessons apply to ISMS risk management?

reading_order.why_first: Presents machine learning frameworks for complex system analysis, offering advanced methods potentially applicable to ISMS data analysis and anomaly detection.
key_questions: How can machine learning analyze complex security data?
What are primary drivers of security events?
How to apply ML for ISMS improvement?
reading_order.paper_title:
A Machine Learning Framework to Deconstruct the Primary Drivers for
  Electricity Market Price Events

actions.label: Study ISO 27001 Compliance Frameworks
actions.how_to: Read papers 1203.6214 and 1203.6622 to understand practical frameworks and measurement methods for ISO 27001 compliance readiness. Use the I-SolFramework software if available to simulate assessments.
actions.expected_outcome: You will be able to describe key ISO 27001 controls and assess compliance readiness using practical tools.

actions.label: Analyze User Acceptance Factors
actions.how_to: Review paper 1103.0405 to learn about factors influencing user acceptance of ISO 27001. Reflect on how these factors apply to your organizational context.
actions.expected_outcome: You will understand social and behavioral factors affecting ISO 27001 implementation success.

actions.label: Explore Governance Integration
actions.how_to: Study paper 1108.2150 to learn how ISO 27001 integrates with COBIT for comprehensive information security governance.
actions.expected_outcome: You will be able to explain benefits and challenges of combining ISO 27001 with other governance frameworks.

actions.label: Conduct a Compliance Gap Analysis
actions.how_to: Use insights from paper 1303.0468 to design a gap analysis model comparing ISO 27001 requirements to current practices in a sample organization or case study.
actions.expected_outcome: You will be able to identify compliance gaps and recommend improvements for ISMS maturity.

actions.label: Develop a Maturity Improvement Plan
actions.how_to: Apply concepts from paper 1807.06184 to create a maturity measurement and improvement plan for ISMS based on identified gaps.
actions.expected_outcome: You will have a structured plan to enhance ISMS maturity aligned with ISO 27001.

actions.label: Understand Regulatory Extensions
actions.how_to: Read paper 2412.18670 to grasp how ISO 27001 interfaces with AI management and emerging regulations, preparing for future compliance challenges.
actions.expected_outcome: You will be aware of evolving compliance requirements and how to adapt ISMS accordingly.

actions.label: Review ISO Standards Development
actions.how_to: Study paper 0911.1842 to understand the ISO standards development process and structure, enhancing your comprehension of ISO 27001's foundation.
actions.expected_outcome: You will appreciate the rationale and structure behind ISO 27001 and related standards.

risks.risk: Limited direct coverage of ISO 27001 basics in provided papers may lead to gaps in foundational knowledge.
risks.mitigation: Focus on papers that address ISO 27001 assessment, governance, and compliance frameworks directly; supplement with practical exercises and external official ISO 27001 documentation if needed.

risks.risk: Some papers focus on ISO 26262 and other standards which may cause confusion regarding ISO 27001 specifics.
risks.mitigation: Clearly distinguish between ISO 27001 and other standards; extract only relevant concepts applicable to information security management.

_topics_suggestion: The selected papers may also cover research areas including: Applied Machine Learning, General Algorithms. You may gain a broader understand of the field by exploring these related research directions
